hero.title: Master Your TFT Journey
hero.subtitle: Calculate rolling probabilities, track your progress, and analyze your performance with comprehensive TFT tools.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to excel in Teamfight Tactics

probability.title: Probability Calculator
probability.desc: Calculate exact rolling odds using Markov chain models

analytics.title: Player Analytics
analytics.desc: Track rank progress and analyze match performance

rolling.title: Rolling Calculator
rolling.desc: Advanced probability calculations using mathematical models to determine your exact odds of hitting desired units.

player.title: Player Lookup
player.desc: Search any player's profile, view their current rank, match history, and detailed performance statistics.

tracking.title: Rank Tracking
tracking.desc: Monitor your rank progression over time with detailed charts and performance analytics.

analysis.title: Match Analysis
analysis.desc: Deep dive into your match performance with detailed breakdowns of compositions, items, and positioning.

tools.title: Utility Tools
tools.desc: Collection of helpful tools including item builders, team comp guides, and meta analysis.

api.title: Developer API
api.desc: Access our API documentation and integrate TFT data into your own applications and projects.

footer.description: Comprehensive tools for Teamfight Tactics players to calculate probabilities, track progress, and analyze performance.

calculator.title: TFT Rolling Probability Calculator
calculator.disclaimer: These are estimates! Since the champion pool changes as players buy and sell, the actual probabilities in-game may vary slightly.

calculator.probabilityChart: Probability of getting at least X copies
